description: This file defines a class VerticalSpaceItemDecoration used for adding vertical spacing between items in a RecyclerView list in an Android app.

classes.name: VerticalSpaceItemDecoration
classes.description: A RecyclerView.ItemDecoration that adds vertical space between list items.

methods.name: getItemOffsets
methods.description: Overrides the method to set the top offset for each item to add vertical spacing, except for the first item.
